titleStmt.title: On the untimely and much lamented death of Mrs. Anne Gray the daughter of the learnedly accomplisht Doctor Nicholas Gray of Tunbridge in Kent, who dyed of the small pox.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Samuel, gent.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Scarce have I dry'd my cheeks, but griefs invite".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
